column1: He's still raw but has been playing like a stud so far. Can't wait till he polishes his post game and improves his IQ on D

Imagine if with one of our other 1st round picks (like the TWolves one) this year Robert Williams from A&M fell to us. Athletic Posterizing PF/C like Collins but he has lockdown defense. Dynamic paint duo for years to come.
Oh nice I've been looking for that last one for a minute
This young man is the future!
